sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-1A-2 - Repealed.Section 7-1A-3 - Repealed.Section 7-1A-4 - Repealed.Section 7-1A-5 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 7 repealed 7-1A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 1, relating to the short title of the Project Mainstream Employment Tax Credit Act, effective July 1, 1990.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 7 repealed 7-1A-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 2, relating to the purpose of the act, effective July 1, 1990.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 7 repealed 7-1A-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 3, relating to definitions, effective July 1, 1990.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 7 repealed 7-1A-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 4, relating to administration of the act, effective July 1, 1990.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 7 repealed 7-1A-5 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 126, § 5, relating to employment tax credit, amount, claimant, procedures, effective July 1, 1990.
